message: Maybe there's a logic that would work, but I'm hungover  ha
is this a feature or ...? I can post before the maker of the topic

For example check out the Animated GIF thread in the lulz group. It takes a while to load if you don't have it cached, even if you've visited it before. What I'm saying is, it would be cool to have the most recent image load in this case, instead of the oldest.
That said, if you're visiting for the first time it'll land you at the top (I think?) so then it would make sense to load from the top.
took forever to find my way back. Will add a +1 to the Topics and Switching between them feedback
